summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 29, 2019. It details inmate statuses, staff assignments, and operational statistics. Most notably, it records inmate Jeffrey Epstein being on 'Psych Obs.' (psychological observation) with an inmate companion, and another inmate at a local hospital under USMS guard.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was on psychological observation ('Psych Obs.') at MCC New York on July 29, 2019.
The report indicates a 'shortage of staff' affecting correctional assignments, specifically the '10-South #2' phone monitor post.
Another inmate, Melendez (#85799-054), was at a local hospital under guard by the U.S. Marshals Service (USMS).
The document is a routine administrative prison log, providing a snapshot of facility operations shortly before Epstein's death.
